channel.title: Someone help me with this code please
channel.description: Does anyone know a code where theres a few link and a box somewhere around it and when you click on one of the link, it opens the link in the box instead of opening or having your browser go to the site?

item.title: Someone help me with this code please
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

From what you’ve described it sounds like you want the target command. target="_blank" will open a new page, whereas, if you name a frame, myframe1 and say target=“myframe1” in the a href tags, it will open it in that frame.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with this code please

item.title: Someone help me with this code please

item.description:
@mikeap4 wrote:

Something like this http://www.apycom.com/navigation-bar-tabs/ex1.html

i tryed using it but it wont work. but see how when you click a tab it stays in the box instead of takin you to a different part of their website.

Read full topic
